name: Epoch (itch) (trubwick)
description:
Controls

Space - Thrust
D / Right - Rotate clockwise
A / Left - Rotate counter-clockwise
R - Restart level
N - Next level
Y - Restart game (at end)

EPOCH - Journey through the solar system in this physics-heavy platformer

Launch your ship from Earth and travel through our solar systems, battling acceleration and inertia to safely dock at planets along the way. Avoid objects to reach your destination and discover the secrets waiting at the furthest edges from the sun.

This is the first ever game from Trubwick, created in a self-imposed game jam lasting two weeks, going form zero game-making knowledge to a fully released game. The game was inspired by the dedication of James SA Corey's commitment to accurately portraying physics in space, particularly 

Please let me know what you think and if you spot any bugs - I will continue to update and add levels to the game. 

Programming, art, music & design: Trubwick Games

Game engie:  GameMaker Studio 2

Additional art & sound design: Helianthus Games, typeoo, Czarcazas, tommccann & DJT4NN3R
